name: Mech Units
description:
Currently in Open Alpha,

 Version 0.0.3. 

In this game, you play as a mech soldier, fighting against a constant stream of enemies. Will you fall like many before you? Or will you rise against the constantly improving mechs that come your way?

Currently is mostly barebones, the fighting, upgrade, and basic enemy system in here, updates will come in time, please leave comments on suggested fixes, additions. and features you would like to see. 

Donations are always welcome, but never required.
